level.heading: Severability.
level.text: Should a court of competent jurisdiction declare any provision of this chapter to be unconstitutional or beyond the authority of the Council of the District of Columbia, such declaration shall have no effect upon any other provision of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-77
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-77, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 32-1501.
